amendment.description: To modify provisions relating to the coal technology program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3270 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3270 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Manchin to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2149) To modify provisions relating to the coal technology program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3270 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
